name: SFML GAME
description: This project was built by C++ language and used SFML that is library for simplify developing 2D game.

name: Custom Notepad
description: This project is written in the Java programming language using object-oriented programming (OOP) principles to create a stand-alone application and to gain a better understanding of OOP.

name: Food Delivery Web Application
description: Developed a food delivery web application for ordering and receiving at canteen in university.The front-end was developed using React JS and developed a backend using ASP.NET Core MVC

name: RUSH PROJECT | Web Profile
description: This portfolio website was completed in one day at 42bangkok. Developed this web using HTML, CSS and JQuery and deployd by Github. This project provides the experience of working collaboratively with another developer

name: Username Web
description: This project assigned as part of the Theory of Computing subject, required the implementation and deployment of the Username website using DFA (Deterministic Finite Automaton). The interactive platform challenges users to deduce the correct username through various states, with accompanying hints provided at each stage.

name: CHIQKO Web Application
description: This project was developed under the Scrum framework, with a single sprint timeline and a focus on selecting key features for a clothing store. The design inspiration was drawn from Uniqlo, and the frontend was developed using React, while the backend was implemented with Node.js. The database utilized for this project is MySQL.

name: BNK48 Lucky Draw
description: I developed a mobile application called BNK48 Lucky Draw for BNK48 fans. The application allows users to participate in a raffle by  writing a title, load background and banner, selecting the number of tickets, lucky numbers, and whether to display the lucky numbers. Users can also export the history of each round, and see an animation when clicking the draw button.

name: Awesome To Do List
description: This web application have four main features(Create, Read, Update and Delete).I developed this project in free time to improve my backend development skills and in order to be full-stack devloper in future

name: Infrastructure Service Management | KBTG
description: Worked in the Asset Management team responsible for inventory management using automation tools to store detailed information about devices such as servers, routers, switches, firewalls, storage, and more. The project's ultimate goal is to achieve automated data storage with accurate, up-to-date information while enabling visibility of the relationships between devices.
